about_the_game:
Disposable Heroes Fantasy 4E


Fantasy Token Pack

This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This set contains full-color token representations of Fantasy 4E core races and classes, beautifully illustrated and colored by Joshua Cayne. Two formats are included: full-body figures and top-cropped figures for a larger image.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • Dragonbrood Fighter
  • Dragonbrood Paladin
  • Dragonbrood Warlord
  • Dwarf Cleric
  • Dwarf Fighter
  • Dwarf Paladin
  • Dwarf Ranger
  • Sidhe Rogue
  • Sidhe Warlord
  • Sidhe Wizard
  • Elf Cleric
  • Elf Ranger
  • Elf Rogue
  • Half-Elf Paladin
  • Half-Elf Warlock
  • Half-Elf Warlord
  • Halfling Ranger
  • Halfling Rogue
  • Halfling Warlock
  • Human Cleric
  • Human Fighter
  • Human Paladin
  • Human Ranger
  • Human Rogue
  • Human Warlock
  • Human Warlord
  • Human Wizard
  • Darkling Rogue
  • Darkling Warlock
  • Darkling Warlord

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Brett M. Bernstein

Released on July 03, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
